attributes.additional_details:
Also many Titles on FIFA 
I want your vote of confidence to make me the new England manager, and show with just 100,00 signatures what we can achieve!!
I want to make it somewhere in life, help a lad out!
attributes.background:
I want to be someone, help a lad out! I have more passion than any of the players put together and will bring back the old football ways of the 90s so we can strive again! 

Level 3 Diploma Sports Coaching and Fitness
Various Titles on Football Manager (including winning world cup with England)
